Key Match Events: Joey Ortiz drove in three runs for Milwaukee
The Brewers scored four runs in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets lost their third straight game and fell one game behind Atlanta in the NL wild card race
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers improved to 12-1 in their last 13 meetings with the Mets
The Mets were shut out for the first time since Aug. 23 and were held to two hits or fewer for just the fifth time this year
Others: Jose Iglesias singled in the first inning to extend his hitting streak to 19 games
Luis Torrens grounded out in the fifth inning, advancing Starling Marte to third base
